titles: Answeres to the particulars proponed by his Majesties commissionar
author: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.
notes: The answer of the Scottish covenanters; the commissioner was James Hamilton, Duke of Hamilton.
In this edition, catchword on first page reads "es".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: Scotland --  History --  Charles I, 1625-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
